Changes the stock battle results pictures.

Package.Name: Battle Results Tank Icon [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes:
res\gui\maps\shop\vehicles\600x450 => Pictures
res\gui\maps\shop\vehicles\360x270 => Pictures

No New Tanks => No Update required
Package.Author: HAWG
Package.Description: This mod will change the stock Battle Results Tank Icon in either a nationalized or an emblem version

Package.Name: Nation emblem by HAWG
Package.Author: HAWG
Package.Description: This mod will change the stock Battle Results Tank Icon ,into a Tank Nation Emblem.\r\nEach Nation has its own emblem.

Package.Name: Beach Party [ADULT CONTENT]
Package.InternalNotes:
removed: res\gui lash folder
new zip file 
renamed new zip file in "Hawg_BattleResults_New_No_Flash.wotmod"

No Flash (!!) - only Pictures
res\gui\maps\shop\vehicles\600x450 => Pictures
res\gui\maps\shop\vehicles\360x270 => Pictures

Package.Name: Nation flag
Package.Author: HAWG
Package.Description: Rise your Flag to your Battle Results\r\nThis mod will change the stock Battle Results Tank Icon ,into a Tank Nation Flag Background.\r\nEach Nation tank will show its own nation flag.

Package.Name: On battle results statistics (HEAVY MOD) [by {author}]
Package.Author: RaJCeL
Package.Description: This mod adds an WN8 indicator for all players to the battle results window.\r\n\r\nWARNING - This mod is downloading data from WG API while battle is loading/on countdown, so depending on bandwidth there can occur micro freezes.

Package.Name: Unanonymizer on battle results [by {author}]
Package.Author: RaJCeL
Package.Description: Anonymized players are marked directly on the players list on the battle results window.\r\n\r\nNo more need to hoover on nick on players detail page as you already have fake and real nickname shown below on the list.

Package.Name: Hangar Manager "HangMan" v{version} [by {author}]
Package.Author: goofy67
Package.Description:
Customize your hangar with HangMan!

Features:

Creating your own hangar during a battle by saving the map and tank position
Possibility to make separate sound settings for each hangar
Change the hangar by:
selector-window or by pressing keys on keyboard 
random (on login and after battle)
depending on nation of selected vehicle
last known position on map of last battle 
Automatic reading of all installed hangars (with exclusion list)
settings-window for keyboard-settings
preview-images installabe

Package.Name: "normal" hangar selection (no changes after battle)
Package.Description: This will set the way the manager selects a hangars to display to "normal".\r\nThat´s the usual manner and will display the previously selected hangar.

Package.Name: GUI fadeout on mousemove (while holding down left mouse)
Package.Description: fades GUI in lobby while dragging mouse

Package.Name: FreeCam v{version}
Package.Description:
usefull for screenshots, as the GUI gets completely disabled

Left-Shift + F3: enabe/disable freecam
W, A, S, D: Move Camera
E, Q: Move camera up and down
P: smooth camera movements (inertia)
and much more, see included XML-file.


by Goofy67

Package.Name: Custom Hangars (Only select one if NOT using hangman)
HMHM - Hellinger Minimal Hangar Mod v{version}
Package.Author: Hellinger

Package.Name: Miku v1 ReWork [by {author}] (overwrites hangar_v3, the default hangar)
Package.Author: TaLLIePO

Package.Name: Premium V2 [by {author}]
Package.Author: olix_vameshu
Package.Description: This hangar was used in World of Tanks in versions 0.9.x as premium-hangar.

Package.Name: Loading Animation (gear/wheel)
Package.InternalNotes:
contains:
waiting.swf
waitingTransition.swf
logos.swf

exchanged infopics in logos.swf and waiting.swf with transparent ones

Gauss:
 L = only logo = logos.swf
WT = waitingTransition.swf
 W =waiting .swf

From Who?
L = only logo = logos.swf
L/A = logo AND waiting animation = logos.swf + waiting.swf + waitingTransition.swf
A = only waiting animation = logos.swf (with default logos, but award/info slots are transparent) + waiting.swf + waitingTransition.swf


2021-05-02: Conversation with Elektro and Willster:
- These mods use the same files as the global dependencies (SWF packages), so if they don't work, then these don't work and can be disabled
Package.Description:
This mod replaces the standard loading animation circle and/or the logo shown at start of the game.
This depends on the selected option.

L = only logo
L/A = logo AND waiting animation
A = only waiting animation

Package.Name: No Loading Logo (in front of Gear Wheel) (L)
Package.Author: HAWG
Package.Description:
good use with an dominante Logo in front of the wheel
ex.
-Iluminati M.V.P by {Aimdrol

Package.Name: Loading Logo (picture) at center of login screen
Package.InternalNotes:
(LL) = Login Logo


this mod uses the res_mods folder.
files: 
	gui\maps\login\__login_logo.png

optional (eg to make it transparent):
	gui\maps\legal_brands.png
	gui\maps\loading_award.png

NOTE 2022-01-25: if/when WG changes the system, those marked as deprecated will get removed
Package.Author: elektrosmoker

Package.Name: HD (LL)
Package.InternalNotes: 2020-09-23: this package was enabled and set visible during the GarageGraphics_Loading_LogoAnimation rework

Package.Name: German Tank Racing (LL)
Package.UpdateComment: keep old German Tank Racing Login logo => new one looks weird

Package.Name: Loading Splashscreen Picture (background image at game start)
Package.InternalNotes:
This [LoginBG] is different to LoginBackground.
It is more like a splashscreen than an actual loading background and geets only showed for a very short period of time (depends on computers abilities).


mode files: only pics 
	gui\maps\login\__login_bg.png


optional (but should be in LoginLogo archives!):
	gui\maps\legal_brands.png
	gui\maps\loading_award.png

NOTE 2022-01-25: if/when WG changes the system, those marked as deprecated will get removed
Package.Author: elektrosmoker
Package.Description: This is the background shown at the game´s beginning (splashcreen).

Package.Name: DEFAULT by Relhax (changes from time to time)
Star Trek - United Federation of Planets
Loginscreen Background
Package.InternalNotes: only pics or videofiles which are shown during the user is on the loginscreen\r\n
Package.Description:
change the style of the login screen. 
you can either use a video that plays in background or a simple picture.

don´t forget to change that in the upper right corner of the login screen

Package.Name: Login Video
Package.InternalNotes:
this is a fix by DrWeb7_1 that prevents the background video to stop when change window mode or switch to another application with ALT-TAB.
as the author staited, this pyc-files do not need updates.

pyc from here: 
https://wgmods.net/2259/ (drweb7_1´s old memories mod)

files:
res_mods\versiondir\scripts\client\gui\Scaleform\daapi\view\login\login_modes\view_background.pyc 

NOTE 2022-01-25: Brought back some old ones, if/when WG changes the system, these will get removed
